pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:1.1.11: The text reads _aṭṭhaṅgula […] sugataṅgulena_, ‘eight finger-breadths of the standard (_sugata_) finger-breadth.’ I follow the suggestion in BMC I, pp. 565–566, that one _sugata_ finger-breadth is approximately two centimeters, making eight such finger-breadths about 16 centimeters.
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc87:2.1.4: See _pācittiya_ 14, [](MS.2.387), for further explanations of these terms.
